long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üóíÔ∏è Notes for Chrome: Your Simple, Secure Notetaking Companion!

Stay organized with the Notes Extension, a user-friendly tool for creating, managing, and securing notes directly in your browser. Whether you're jotting down a quick thought, saving important reminders, or storing sensitive information, the Notes Extension has you covered with powerful features that keep your notes both accessible and private.

üöÄ Key Features:
‚≠ê Create and Organize Notes: Easily add titles, format content, and save multiple notes with an intuitive, streamlined interface.
‚≠ê Secure Your Notes: Lock notes with a custom password, protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access.
‚≠ê Customizable Dark Mode: Switch between light and dark themes to suit your reading preference and reduce eye strain.
‚≠ê Quick Access to Recent Notes: Display the two most recent notes for easy reference, with full note management options.
‚≠ê Popup Note Viewing: Open notes in a compact, standalone window for focused reading and editing without distractions.
‚≠ê Persistent Storage: All notes are saved locally, ensuring your information is always available even when offline.
Stay organized, keep your information safe, and make the most of your browser with this convenient Notes Extension!
